Header: Meditation Continues for Better Tomorrow of Troops
Content: One more meditation programme, initiated by the Directorate of Psychological Operations got underway on Wednesday (8) at Kanduboda, Baunseth Mental Wellness Vipassana Meditation Centre. This meditation programme was conducted by Ven Diyasenpura Vimala Thera, as one more phase under the Lakmini Spiritual Advancement Programme. 63 Army troops and 19 Naval troops including two Officers attended this programme, meant for spiritual advancement. Director Psychological Operations, Brigadier Athula Hannedige supervised this programme.
